channel.title: Roger Tooze on
channel.description: Recent content in Roger Tooze on

item.title: Authority and Markets: Interpreting the Work of Susan Strange
item.description: Tooze, Roger, Christopher May. “Authority and Markets: Interpreting the Work of Susan Strange.” In Authority and Markets: Susan Strange’s Writings of International Political Economy, edited by Roger Tooze, Christopher May. 1-16. New York: Palgrave Macmillan, 2002. Introduction to a collection of 16 of Susan Strange’s works, divided into five sections, each featuring an introduction and commentary by Roger Tooze and Christopher May. Keywords: Political Economy; Structural Power, Power; Theory; Other

item.title: Ideology, Knowledge and Power in International Relations and International Political Economy
item.description: Tooze, Roger. “Ideology, Knowledge and Power in International Relations and International Political Economy.” In Strange Power: Shaping the Parameters of International Relations and International Political Economy, edited by Thomas Lawton, James Rosenau, Amy C. Verdun, 175-194. London: Routledge, 2000. Keywords: Theory; Knowledge; Political Economy; International Relations Text access (external link)

item.title: Susan Strange, Academic International Relations and the Study of International Political Economy
item.description: Tooze, Roger. “Susan Strange, Academic International Relations and the Study of International Political Economy.” New Political Economy 5, no. 2 (2000): 280-289. Keywords: Theory; Political Economy; Other Text access (external link)
